credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Purse
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: embroidered on supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Purse in the shape of an elongated shield in red velvet with drawstring at the top finished in tassels. Gold braid on the sides and top, and a single gold tassel at the bottom. With metal thread embroidery in a floral form.
name: Purse
